dmca.title: Warmboard chilly toward alleged copycat
dmca.body:
Section 1

The copyrighted work at issue is the text and pages that appear at www.allfloorheatinq.co.uk. This site is a clear verbatim copy of the original site and content of www.warmboard.com.
The owner (Warmboard.com) is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the Warmboard.com website and the text, artwork, logos and photographs that appear therein.

Section 2
The material that is infringing on the copyrights of Warmboard.com consists of all pages, text, graphics and photos of the site www.warmboard.com

Search results on Google: Search 1:

A. Search query = Warmboard
B. URL for each infringing search result: see below


Radiant Heat By Warmboard: FAQ
Warmboard has addftional advantages of faster response time, no "undershoot" or "overshoot" ... How do you fasten (install) Warmboard to the floor joists? ... www.allfloorheating.co.uk/faqs.html - 17k - Cached - Similar pages
Radiant Heat By Warmboard: Contractors & Builders
Warmboard stands alone compared to all other radiant panels for the simple reason ... This simple idea, unique to Warmboard, provides numerous efficiencies ... www.allfloorheating.co.uk/calculator.html - 25k - Cached - Similar pages
